Package it.polimi.ingsw.am37.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am37.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
The class represent the player board in the game. This hold the tower and students container, provide access for adding and removing elements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board(int numOfPlayer, TowerColor color, boolean coinsEnabled, Player player)
    The default constructor create empty entrance and dining rooms and fill the tower containers
    Board(int numOfPlayer, TowerColor color, boolean coinsEnabled, LimitedStudentsContainer entrance, Player player)
    The advanced constructor create empty dining room and fill the tower container, also fill the entrance with provided container to speed up the process

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int numOfPlayer, TowerColor color, boolean coinsEnabled, Player player)
      The default constructor create empty entrance and dining rooms and fill the tower containers
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayer - the number of player in this match, use it to use different limits on the containers
      color - the color of tower of the player
      coinsEnabled - the flag to activate coins logic
      player - It's the owner of the board

    • Board

      public Board(int numOfPlayer, TowerColor color, boolean coinsEnabled, LimitedStudentsContainer entrance, Player player)
      The advanced constructor create empty dining room and fill the tower container, also fill the entrance with provided container to speed up the process
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayer - the number of player in this match, use it to use different limits on the containers
      color - the color of tower of the player
      coinsEnabled - the flag to activate coins logic
      entrance - the container of the students extracted from the bag at the beginning
      player - It's the owner of the board
